[!INCLUDE[vs2017banner](../../assembler/inline/includes/vs2017banner.md)]

-   [\_\_assume](../../intrinsics/assume.md)

-   [check\_stack de \#pragma](../../preprocessor/check-stack.md)  
  
-   [função de \#pragma](../../preprocessor/function-c-cpp.md)
